          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">How Often? How Long? 1</string>
            <string language="en">How Often? How Long? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Häufig? Wie Sehnen Sie Sich? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien de fois ? Combien de temps ? 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como Frequentemente? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni quanto tempo? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο συχνά; Πόσο καιρό πολύ; 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo A menudo? ¿Cuanto tiempo? 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Practise the use of time expressions by answering some questions.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Practice the use of time expressions by Answering some questions. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">leisure</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">time expressions</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">leisure</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">time expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Üben Sie den Gebrauch von Zeitausdrücken, indem
Sie einige Fragen beantworten. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratiquez l'utilisation des expressions de temps 
en répondant à quelques questions. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour les débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pratique o uso de expressões do tempo 
respondendo a algumas perguntas. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi nell'uso delle espressioni di tempo 
rispondendo ad alcune domande. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per
i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική η χρήση των χρονικών εκφράσεων με την 
απάντηση σε μερικών ερωτήσεων. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι
εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Practique el uso de las expresiones del tiempo 
contestando a algunas preguntas. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral
para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
